      • writeLine

        public void writeLine​(StudyOrAssayTableObject initiator)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Write a single line for a Study or Assay into the corresponding OutputStream or File.

        NOTE: Do not forget to call '.closeFile()' for the corresponding Study or Assay to finish writing.
        Parameters:
        initiator - initiator being the first object in the line that is then connected via a chain of processes and samples/materials etc. to the last.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to write the given initiator into the OutputStream or File
